settings.title: How much do {{ collection.title }} cost?
settings.answer: The price of your {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_2.value }} depends on a handful of things such as the style of mug you choose, how many pieces you order, and number of sides you print or engrave. Kodiak is happy to offer bulk volume discount pricing on all {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_1.value }} orders.

settings.title: Is there a Minimum Order Quantity for {{ collection.title }}?
settings.answer: Yes, due to the customization process, we have a minimum order requirement of $250 on Bulk Pricing Orders. However, we offer single unit sample orders to test out our products as well as low minimal order options for those only looking to order a few units.

settings.title: Can I get my company logo printed on the {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_1.value }}?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in printing company logos on {{ collection.metafields.custom.product_type.value }}, making them perfect for promotional events, corporate gifts and employee gifts, or branded merchandise.

settings.title: Where can I place my design on {{ collection.title }}?
settings.answer: Good news! We give you plenty of real estate to showcase your creativity. The most popular spots are the Full Front, Full Back, and Left Chest Pocket areas. Got a bigger order of more than 12 pieces? We can also customize the sleeves for you!

settings.title: Where can I add a design to my {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_1.value }} {{ collection.title }}
settings.answer: At Kodiak, we're all about giving you options. Our {{ collection.title }} are no exception, offering a diverse selection suitable for everyone. Want to make it extra special? You can customize both the front and the back! Add your logo or design to the front, and if you're feeling creative, go ahead and slap a second design or personalized names on the back. It's your tumbler, your way—perfect for adding that extra personal touch or brand visibility.

settings.title: How will my {{ collection.title }} design be printed?
settings.answer:
We offer both laser engraved customization which reveals your logo in stainless steel, and Full Color UV Printing if you would like your logo or design to be in full color.

  • Laser Engraved: Perfect for your business, event, or team to use as employee gifts, client gifts, and tradeshow giveaways.
  • UV Printed Full Color: Perfect for businesses looking to get their logo printed on the tumblers in full color.

settings.title: How Fast can I receive my {{ collection.title }} order?
settings.answer: With rush priority processing, we can expedite your order and deliver your {{ collection.title }} order within 5 business days. Our standard production time is 5-10 business days + shipping. We offer Free Shipping with UPS ground on all orders over $1000.

settings.title: Can I get a sample before placing a large order?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We understand the importance of quality, so we offer sample {{ collection.title }} for you to review before committing to a larger order. This ensures you're satisfied with the final product. You can checkout all of our sample options in our samples collection here.

settings.title: Why are {{ collection.title }} Popular Gifts & Giveaways?
settings.answer: {{ collection.title }} have become increasingly sought-after as gifts and giveaways, and arecent study done in 2023 by Advertising Specialty Institution (ASI) underscores their effectiveness. These personalized drinkware items can generate up to 3,162 impressions over their lifetime, ensuring that a business or event remains top-of-mind for long after receiving the drinkware. A significant 63% of consumers have indicated that they would retain and utilize a custom tumbler for at least a year, emphasizing its lasting appeal. Additionally, 30% of consumers are more inclined to engage with an advertiser that gifted them with logo drinkware. Given these compelling statistics, it's evident that custom tumblers, with their blend of functionality and simple business branding promotion, are a favorite choice for both personal gifts and bulk promotional giveaways.

settings.title: What are the Benefits of {{ collection.title }} to Your Business
settings.answer:
Brand Visibility: Custom tumblers can generate up to 3,162 impressions over their lifetime, ensuring consistent brand exposure.

Customer Loyalty: 30% of consumers are more likely to engage with a business that gifts them logoed drinkware.

Cost-Effective Marketing: The cost per impression for a $10 insulated travel mug is just 1/3 of a cent, offering a high return on investment.

Long-Term Use: 63% of consumers will keep and use a custom tumbler for at least a year, ensuring prolonged brand promotion.

Eco-Friendly Promotion: Reusable tumblers reduce the need for disposable cups, showcasing a business's commitment to sustainability.

Versatile Marketing Tool: Suitable for various events, from trade shows to corporate meetings.

Personalized Touch: Customization allows businesses to connect with their audience on a personal level.

Increased Brand Recall: Regular use of the tumbler ensures that consumers frequently remember and associate with the brand.

Practicality: As functional items, they cater to a daily need, ensuring that they're used often.

settings.title: What are the Most Popular {{ collection.title }} Colors Businesses Buy?
settings.answer: Businesses often gravitate towards neutral and versatile colors for {{ collection.title }}, such as black, white, silver, and navy blue. These colors provide a professional look and ensure that logos and branding stand out. However, with the growing trend of brand personalization, many businesses are also exploring vibrant colors like red, teal, and purple to make their {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_2.value }} more distinctive.

settings.title: Who all Buys {{ collection.title }}?
settings.answer: Our {{ collection.title }} are popular among a wide range of customers including businesses, event organizers, sports teams, and individuals looking for personalized items. Whether you're planning a corporate event, a family reunion, or simply want to promote your business, our wide selection of {{ collection.title }} has got you covered, no matter your style or needs.

settings.title: How Many {{ collection.title }} Should I Buy?
settings.answer: Whether you're just looking for one special item or you're a big company needing a large quantity, we've got you covered. The number of {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_2.value }} you should purchase depends on the occasion and your budget. Most Importantly, we offer bulk volume pricing, meaning the more you order, the more savings you'll enjoy. settings.title: How long does it take to receive my order of {{ collection.title }}?
settings.answer: Standard processing orders ship in 5-10 business days. With priority processing, we can ship your {{ collection.title }} order in as little as 1-3 business days. Shipping times will depend on your location but we ship UPS Ground from Green Bay Location and most orders arrive within 2-3 business days of initial shipping date. Need it faster? We will do our best to meet any deadline!

settings.title: Are the customizations permanent, or will they fade over time?
settings.answer: Our advanced uv printing and laser engraving techniques ensure that your new customized cups will last a lifetime and resistant to fading, even with daily use use.

settings.title: What if I'm not satisfied with my {{ collection.metafields.custom.seo_kw_1.value }} order?
settings.answer: Customer satisfaction and long-term relationships are what we're all about. Thanks to our digital proofing system, you'll get a sneak peek of how your design or logo will appear on your chosen product—be it drinkware, leather patch hats, or embroidered and screen-printed apparel—before we even start on your order. And hey, if you've given the thumbs-up to the digital proof but aren't thrilled with the final product, just give our customer service team a shout. We're here to make things right and find a solution that works for you.

settings.title: Do the customizations on the apparel last, or will they fade over time?
settings.answer: Great question! Our top-notch techniques in laser engraving for leather patches, screen printing, and embroidery are all about longevity. Rest assured, your personalized apparel is designed to stand the test of time. These customizations are fade-resistant, ensuring that your unique designs and logos will continue to pop, wear after wear.
